block.p: TRW INC., -- Cleveland, sold two electronic-sensor units, formerly part of TRW's auto-parts division, to Measurement Specialties Inc., Fairfield, N.J., for $17.7 million as it sheds businesses to reduce debt.

ATLANTIC COAST HOLDINGS INC., -- Dulles, Va., a regional airline, announced a firm agreement to buy three Canadair regional jets from Bombardier Inc. for about $66 million and a conditional offer for 27 more.

TRW INC., -- Cleveland, sold two electronic-sensor units, formerly part of TRW's auto-parts division, to Measurement Specialties Inc., Fairfield, N.J., for $17.7 million as it sheds businesses to reduce debt.

ATLANTIC COAST HOLDINGS INC., -- Dulles, Va., a regional airline, announced a firm agreement to buy three Canadair regional jets from Bombardier Inc. for about $66 million and a conditional offer for 27 more.

UNITED TECHNOLOGIES CORP., -- Hartford, said its Pratt & Whitney unit had won a contract valued at $410 million to maintain the jet engines on a dozen United Parcel Service Inc. freighter aircraft over 10 years.

B. F. GOODRICH CO., -- Charlotte, has won contracts to supply as much as $600 million in aircraft parts to Lockheed Martin Corp. for an updated version of Lockheed's Galaxy transport plane for the U.S. Air Force.
